about_the_game:
- Welcome to the Planet NESS-444 -

  • The Planet NESS-444 is a vast world full of Adventure,

enemies to face or to have as allies in battle,

valuable resources to gather, mysteries and secrets to unveil.

  • Climb the world's highest peaks to discover breathtaking views or

wander into the depths of the planet to reveal ruins of ancient lost civilizations.

  • Unique biomes scattered across the land waiting for you to explore them,

until you are able to discover the truth...

- Nessky -

The Nessky are the strange creatures that populate the planet Ness-444.

  • During your adventure you will encounter a wide diversity of creatures, separated into four categories:

-A minority dwell in shelters, offering you safe places to take refuge and prepare for the difficulties you will encounter.

-The Nessky living in the wild were once friendly...but now

corrupted and blinded by darkness you will be seen as a threat....

-Some examples of the strongest species have fallen under the influence of natural gems and have developed powers extremely hard to counter.

-Rare species from an adverse past will manifest as calamities, so do not be unprepared.
- Combat -

  • Take on powerful enemies using a wide selection of melee weapons : (For now there are 20)

-Swords (5)

-Swords and Shields (6)

-Greatswords (4)

-Maces (3)

-Giant Maces (2)

  • Use your unnatural powers to cast devastating elemental spells : (For Now There Are 15)

-Sphere of TimeFlame (3)

-Meteorites of Fire (3)

-Discharge of Volts (3)

-Ice Runes (3)

-Water Tornadoes (3)

  • Gain experience by winning ferocious battles and level up to get new spells, crafting recipes and skill points that will help increase your stats :

+ Life (HP)

+ Endurance (Stamina)

+ Wisdom (Mana)

+ Strength (Melee Damage)

+ Agility (Speed/Attack Speed)

+ Intelligence (Spell Damage)

+ Crit Chance (% critical hit)

  • Defeat all the Nessky to discover new materials, weapons and equipment.

  • Find and defeat bosses that carry natural gems to restore the balance of biomes.- Ghiandinis Guild -

  • Visit the guild of Ghiandinis located in each of the nessky shelters.

-Exchange various types of rare acorns found by defeating special nessky, completing quests and exploring secret locations.

-Collect all the nessky relics crafted by a mysterious sculptor and hidden across the map and trade them  for special rewards.

-Receive high-level special quests to obtain unique rewards and the possibility to visit inaccessible places.- Crafting -

  • Strengthen yourself by forging powerful equipment and accessories that will help you in your adventure.

  • Craft Devastating weapons such as swords and shields, broadswords, and giant maces.

  • Craft and Find special equipments that can help you reach difficult locations like Highwind Castle or deadly areas like the lands of Toxmoria.

  • By leveling up you will gain spells , skill points and new creations recipes for essential items such as potions, food and drink :

-potions for life, stamina and mana speed and jump boosts.

-foods of increased attack, critical hit and damage

-drinks of defense, elemental shields and resistance from Heat/Cold.

name: The Last Worlds : Crossed Souls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: This infos will be updated after the first build of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: This infos will be updated after the first build of the game.

short_description: 3D Action Open World RPG set on the alien planet Ness-444. Explore this world on the brink of ruin with your inseparable companion Lupio. Fight or tame countless nessky, fantastic creatures now blinded by darkness. Survive to learn the truth of this world and find out where other like you have gone.
